text: Jérémy De Vriendt (born 22 March 1986) is a Belgian football goalkeeper. He previously played for Standard Liège, KV Mechelen and White Star Woluwe. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Standard Liège players Category:KV Mechelen players Category:Living people Category:RWS Bruxelles players Category:Belgian footballers
title: Jérémy De Vriendt
